title: SOLD: Bob Caruthers N162 Goodwin Champions
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: SOLD: Bob Caruthers N162 Goodwin Champions
posts.post_content:
------------- SOLD --------------

Up for sale here is a Bob Caruthers N162 1888 Goodwin Champions. Solid color and the card is in nice shape. I was hoping this would land an SGC 10 grade, but it was given Authentic - I'm guessing because of the significantly rounded lower corner. 

Very faint wrinkling/creasing across middle but no writing, significant paper loss, etc. This looks very much like a 10 or even 20 to me.

Brand new holder. Scratches on images are on my scanner.
